mapper.update: update sss_car set route_ID = #{routeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_Type = #{carType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_Origin = #{carOrigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carPro_Date = #{carproDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, carBuy_Date = #{carbuyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, car_Capacity = #{carCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, car_State = #{carState,jdbcType=BIT}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where car_ID = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select car_ID, route_ID, car_Type, car_Origin, carPro_Date, carBuy_Date, car_Capacity, car_State, comment from sss_car where car_ID = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select car_ID, route_ID, car_Type, car_Origin, carPro_Date, carBuy_Date, car_Capacity, car_State, comment from sss_car
